name: convos
description: Convos is a self-hosted web chat client for IRC that stores message history and offers a clean modern interface. It lets users maintain private chat servers, integrate with multiple networks, and access messages from any device.
features: IRC Web Client: Modern interface for classic IRC networks. Best of both worlds.
Message History: Persistent storage of conversations and logs. Never miss a message.
Multi-Network: Connect to multiple IRC servers simultaneously. Centralized chat hub.
Modern UI: Clean, responsive design for comfortable chatting. Pleasant user experience.
Cross-Device: Access your chats from any device with a browser. Seamless continuity.
Self-Hosted: Run your own IRC client with full control. Privacy-focused communication.
